text: Dawood refers to the figure of David in Islam, the second king of the united Kingdom of Israel according to the Hebrew Bible. Dawood may also refer to: * Dawood (name), a common male given name and surname * DaWood, David Dawood (born 1981), English DJ, producer and songwriter * Dawood Group, a leading Pakistani holding company * Dawood Public School, a famous educational institution in Bangladesh ==See also== * Dagwood (disambiguation)
title: Dawood (disambiguation)
